Name: R Sampath Raj
Tweet: Karnataka is the first state to have a Universal Health Coverage Scheme 'Arogya Bhagya'. Our #NavaKarnatakaManifesto focusses on the extension of successful health schemes across the state to reach more beneficiaries. A healthier Karnataka for #NavaKarnatakaNirmana  https://t.co/fmzG4SkdBz
